infos.title: Radioactive Block/Item
infos.description: Some Blocks/Items are radioactive. When having them in the inventory, you will have the radioactive effect. [br] [br] Radiation Level 1: [br] - Uranium Ore [br] - Uranium Block [br] - Uranium Ingot . [br] [br] Radiation Level 2: [br] - Neptunium Ore [br] - Neptunium Block [br] - Neptunium Ingot [br] [br] Radiation Level 3: [br] - Plutonium Ore [br] - Plutonium Block [br] - Plutonium Ingot

infos.title: Oxygen Tank
infos.description: Oxygen Tank allow you to keep oxygen with you. [br] [br] How to use: [br] - Filling a tank : When Having a space suit that is running out of oxygen, click the oxygen tank. The oxygen contained in the tank will be transfered to the suit. [br] - Oxygenate a room : place the full tank in the slot in the [ref=machines:oxygen_distributor]Oxygen [ref=machines:oxygen_distributor]Distributor. [br] [br] How to fill: [br] - Insert the tank in the [ref=machines:water_separator]Water [ref=machines:water_separator]Separator under the oxygen tank. [br]
